name: Cult Initiate
flavor: A low-ranking cultist in simple robes, eager to gain power.

features.name: Minion (6) - Passive
features.desc: The Initiate is defeated when they take any damage. For every 6 damage a PC deals to the Initiate, defeat an additional Minion within range the attack would succeed against.

features.name: Group Attack - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Cult Initiates within Close range of them. Those Minions move into Melee range of the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 5 physical damage each. Combine this damage.
